analysis.key_quote: I strongly disagree that there are lots of ne'er do wells who under current rules are difficult to fire. I see this aspersion as a pretext for the proposed changes and know others will as well.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about job security for current and future employees, and criticizing the rationale behind the changes as a pretext. This aligns with themes of merit-based systems and due process protections.
